comments:
Due to the latest changes in TransactionImpl.addTriggers() the following exception appear at the end of transaction. If I rollback changes to 1.11 state of TransactionImpl everything starts working ok.

The problem is: getTriggers() called from DiagramEditingDomainFactory.DiagramEditingDomain.precommit() and NOOP_TRIGGER passed as a parameter with singletonList inside.

This is blocking our GMF 2.0M3 build.

Yes, this was a last-minute change to adapt to a change in EMF's CompoundCommand that broke our TriggerCommand.

I'll see what I can come up with.

Fixed by copying the list of triggers, to handle cases where clients such as GMF use custom TriggerCommands with read-only lists of commands.

Tested with the org.eclipse.gmf.tests.runtime.diagram.ui.

Applied the same changes to 1.0.3 branch, to ensure that deployment of Transaction 1.0.3 with EMF 2.3 does not break on this incompatible API change in EMF.  The same list copying is done in 1.0.3 to avoid breaking GMF again  :-)
